body:
It's not NTR, I can read the jap a bit, it's not perfect ... On page 10 she says it's just medicine because she doesn't have a husband... And she not have a ring

The tag, "cheating" must be for the boy on the train

Atage bating a sequel with the loli imouto, I knew they couldn’t resist going a full doujin without a loli. This is pretty good, though I still don’t like ugly bastards. Im even more excited for the sequel though.
